summary: Adds a spell to the player called Conceal Thievery which resets bounties and stolen items.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a spell to the player called Conceal Thievery which resets bounties and stolen items.

[list]
[*]There are casting requirements which if not met will kill you.

[*]There is a cost to casting the spell which is paid for in XP.

[/list]
author: Paul Sprague
